title: Bobby Kicks Off Filming For American Idol + Eddie Is Changing Up Christmas This Year
itunes:title: Bobby Kicks Off Filming For American Idol + Eddie Is Changing Up Christmas This Year
description:
Producer Eddie talks about how he's changing up Christmas at his house this year. Lunchbox confuses a random woman for a country artist. Also, Bobby talks about his first few days on the set of American Idol.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
